teaching.courseName: Power System Analysis by Computer Methods
teaching.description: Advanced course covering numerical methods for power system analysis, including power flow, optimal power flow, and dynamic simulation. Emphasis on high-performance computing and modern software development practices.
Fundamentals of power system analysis, including per-unit systems, power flow studies, economic operation, and symmetrical components. Introduction to power system stability and protection.
